title: Urban tree cover provides consistent mitigation of extreme heat in arid but not humid cities
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Sustainable Cities and Society, Volume 113

Author(s): Peter C. Ibsen, Benjamin R. Crawford, Lucila M. Corro, Kenneth J. Bagstad, Brandon E. McNellis, George D. Jenerette, Jay E. Diffendorfer
siteTitle: ScienceDirect Publication: Sustainable Cities and Society
